title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Critically acclaimed with an 87 Metacritic score and 8.1 IMDb rating from over 76K votes. Features renowned creator Vince Gilligan on the prestigious Apple TV platform.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, amid a spate of unexplained disappearances of local children, a group of misfit friends begin to suspect a long-buried ancient evil lurking. As the kids set out to determine what's really going on, a rising unease prompts several townspeople to work together to restore peace – all while a U.S. military operation seeks to exploit Derry for its own objectives.
reason: Highly anticipated prequel on HBO with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 71K votes and a strong 8.2 TMDB score from 1.1K+ votes, leveraging a popular horror IP.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: A high-profile Netflix crime drama featuring A-list actors Jason Bateman and Jude Law, garnering a 7.3 IMDb rating from over 39K votes.

title: Monster: The Ed Gein Story
overview: The shocking true-life tale of Ed Gein, the infamous murderer and grave robber who inspired many of Hollywood's most iconic on-screen killers.
reason: From prolific creator Ryan Murphy and starring Charlie Hunnam, this Netflix true crime drama is poised for significant cultural impact given the success of previous 'Monster' installments.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.
reason: A well-received Netflix drama with a 7.9 IMDb rating from over 22K votes and a 73 Metacritic score, featuring known actress Vera Farmiga.
